channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Christians mounting a moral counter to Trump's immigration agenda
item.description: A diverse coalition of moderate and progressive Christians has opted to jump off the pulpit and challenge President Trump around immigration, civil ri...

item.title: Snapshots of life at the White House East Wing
item.description: President Trump has faced backlash for his $300 million ballroom plans . But the White House East Wing has undergone several changes since it was adde...

item.title: Trump sets new shutdown record
item.description: Data: Congress.gov ; Note: Days are counted from the first day to the last full day that the government was shut down; Chart: Erin Davis/Axios Visuals...

item.title: Behind the Curtain: America's energy jam
item.description: America faces an economy-shaping energy jam : We've never needed more of it more urgently to meet rising consumer and business demand. Why it matters:...

item.title: Farmers, ranchers question Trump bailout of Argentina as they struggle
item.description: President Trump’s decision to bail out Argentina has sparked outrage among U.S. farmers struggling from the trade war with China.

item.title: E.U. joins U.S. with new Russia sanctions as Trump’s shift buoys Ukraine
item.description: President Donald Trump’s sanctions against Russia’s two biggest oil companies come as the European Union passes its 19th package targeting the energy ...

item.title: Many presidents have renovated the White House. Trump’s ballroom is different.
item.description: Construction on Trump’s massive and expensive ballroom is underway, but it’s far from the first extreme makeover made to what’s known as the People’s ...

item.title: Dominion Voting, vilified by Trump after 2020, rebrands to appeal to skeptics
item.description: Election technology companies are moving forward after years of expensive litigation and damaged reputations from unfounded attacks.

item.title: Republicans struggle to explain shutdown of the House
item.description: Speaker Mike Johnson’s initial strategy to jam the Senate has not worked, but he refuses to change tactics.

item.title: Exclusive: Sanders weighs in on AOC's future, 2028
item.description: Sen. Bernie Sanders (I-Vt.) believes that Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez (D-N.Y.) would make a formidable presidential candidate in 2028, he tells Axio...

item.title: Trump's approval holds steady despite unpopular policies, per new NYT poll
item.description: Trump’s strength with Republicans on the economy could prove to be a boon for the GOP.

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Trump is selling a strong economy. Voters aren’t buying it.
item.description: Privately, aides concede voters remain uneasy about prices but argue their policies are beginning to turn things around.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
